Name: Cruel Intention
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare lime slice wheel for garnish.

History: Discovered in 2005 at The Mansion in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
Nutrition: One serving of Cruel Intention contains 185 calories
